channel.title: openai on Anthony Dellavecchia
channel.description: Recent content in openai on Anthony Dellavecchia

item.title: Summarize Text from Images
item.description: See some text you don’t want to read? Pull out your phone -> Take a picture of it -> Get texted a summary of what it says Here’s a gif of using it in action: I also wrote a tutorial, so you can build this app yourself. Check it out on Twilio’s Blog. You can check out the code on GitHub.
